Description_lang: Hurls bombs, creating burning orbs that slowly travel down the walkway. Coming into contact with a flaming orb inflicts $s1 Fire damage, reduces movement speed by $s2%, and burns for an additional $s3 Fire damage every $t3 sec for $d.The intermission ends when $@spellname248321 is interrupted.
AuraDescription_lang: Movement speed reduced by $s2%.$s3 Fire damage inflicted every $t3 sec.
